Title: Paper Hearts
Plot: Mulder's dreams help him in finding the body of a little girl which reopens one of his old cases in the Violent Crimes Unit and leads him to believe the killer he captured had more victims and may have taken his sister many years before.
GuestStars: Vanessa Morley, Byrne Piven, Jane Perry, Edward Diaz, Paul Bittante, Carly McKillip, Tom Noonan, Jenny-Lynn Hutcheson
